comments.comment: Declaration of the VerticalProps interface which extends the ViewProps from 'app-studio', indicating that it inherits all the properties of a view.
Optional boolean property 'isReversed' to determine if the vertical view should be displayed in reverse order.
Defines the functional component VerticalView with props specified by VerticalProps
Sets a default alignment for content within the vertical container to 'flex-start'
Determines the direction in which the vertical elements are stacked, default not reversed
Start of the JSX return block where the View component is customized to act as a vertical container
Sets the display style of the container to 'flex' to enable flexbox properties
Applies the justifyContent value to align child components within the vertical container
Uses the isReversed prop to set the flex direction to 'column-reverse' if true, otherwise to 'column'
Spreads the rest of the props onto the View component to handle additional properties passed
Exports the VerticalView component for use in other parts of the application
Defines the VerticalComponent as a functional component with VerticalProps as its props signature.
Renders the VerticalView component, passing all of the received props through to it.
Exports the VerticalComponent as Vertical for use in other parts of the application.
